description: The purpose of this scholarship is to provide financial support for junior or senior Insurance majors. Eligibility Requirements Complete application and upload transcript Enrolled full-time Must be enrolled as a junior or senior for the following year Minimum 3.0 GPA Must provide a written statement demonstrating financial need Must be a declared Insurance major Must be in the Insurance and Risk Management club This scholarship is available to apply for during the current student application period.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
